VARDESC: In what ways has the COVID-19 outbreak affected your overall healthcare? (Mark all that apply)
VALUES: 1 = I did not go to healthcare appointments because I was concerned about entering my healthcare provider's office
column19: 3 = My healthcare provider changed to phone or online visits
column20: 4 = My healthcare provider told me to self-isolate or quarantine

VARDESC: Did your school close because of the COVID-19 outbreak?
column19: 3 = I am not enrolled in any school

VARDESC: Do you usually receive free meals at school?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did your school close because of the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Has your school offered meals during the school closure from COVID-19?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Do you usually receive free meals at school?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Have you been able to get the school-provided meals during the COVID-19 associated closure?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Has your school offered meals during the school closure from COVID-19?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Has your school offered online learning while closed?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did your school close because of the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Has your school provided either of the following to support online learning? Free home internet access
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Has your school offered online learning while closed?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Has your school provided either of the following to support online learning? Free computer or tablet
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Has your school offered online learning while closed?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: What type of internet access do you have at home? (Mark all that apply)
column20: 3 = Smartphone not connected to WiFi network at home (e.g., use cellular, LTE, mobile hotspot, neighbor's WiFi)
column21: 4 = I do not have internet access at home

VARDESC: Did you have high-speed broadband internet access at home prior to March 1, 2020?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'What type of internet access do you have at home?' = 'High-speed broadband internet (\WiFi\") (e.g. DSL

What have you done to cope with your stress related to the COVID-19 outbreak? (Mark all that apply)
column18: 2 = Engaging in more family activities (e.g., games, sports)
column20: 4 = Increasing time reading books, or doing activities like puzzles and crosswords
